name: Ugly Gems
description:
Play Ugly Gems and swap, combo, and level your way past hundreds of stages in this immersive puzzle exploration.

Ugly Gems is a free-to-play match-three puzzle video game.

There are infinite levels increasing in difficulty and necessary endurance. Try to get to the highest level and stage. Matched combos of 3+ give you experience points (yellow) that help you level up. Each piece swap takes away move points (red). Stay alive trying not to lose experience after running out of moves. Aim for the highest level possible beyond the furthest stage.
